title: Congratulating Amber Lynn upon setting an age group world record at the 2010 Northeast Regional Single Lift Powerlifting Championships
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE  RESOLUTION  congratulating  Amber  Lynn upon setting an age
group world record at the 2010 Northeast Regional Single Lift Powerlift-
ing Championships

WHEREAS, Excellence and success in competitive sports  can  be  achieved
only  through  strenuous  practice,  nurtured  by dedicated coaching and
strategic planning; and
  WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body to recognize and pay
tribute to those esteemed individuals within the State of New  York  who
distinguish  themselves  through  outstanding  achievements in worldwide
athletic competition; and
  WHEREAS, Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its  long-
standing  traditions, this Legislative Body is justly proud to congratu-
late Amber Lynn upon setting an age  group  world  record  at  the  2010
Northeast Regional Single Lift Powerlifting Championships; and
  WHEREAS,  The  event which was held at Johnson City Senior High School
on Saturday, May 29, 2010, drew about 80 different competitors from nine
states; and
  WHEREAS, Amber Lynn's overall record is outstanding; she  was  loyally
and enthusiastically supported by family, fans, friends and the communi-
ty at large; and
  WHEREAS, A Binghamton resident, Amber Lynn picked up 198 pounds in the
deadlift  competition,  which  is  a  record  for the 20-24-year-old age
group; and
  WHEREAS, Sports competition instills the  values  of  self-motivation,
pride and accomplishment, and Amber Lynn has clearly made a contribution
to  the spirit of excellence which is a tradition of her community; now,
therefore, be it
  RESOLVED, That this Legislative Body pause  in  its  deliberations  to
congratulate  Amber  Lynn  upon setting an age group world record at the
2010 Northeast Regional Single Lift Powerlifting Championships;  and  be
it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Amber Lynn.
